TEXT.TITLE: INTEGRATED GENERICS <IGN> WILL NOT COMMENT
TEXT.BODY: Integrated Generics Inc said it is in the midst of several developments which could be favorable for the company but can make no further comments at the present time. The company said it released this brief statement in response to the American Stock Exchange's inquiry on the activity of the company's common stock, which was up 5/8 to five in midafternoon trading. Reuter
